metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29962 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: Firefox for Android would become unstable and hard-to-recover when a website opened too many popups. *This bug only affects Firefox for Android. Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 89.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
